abstract: Rep Trey Gowdy, chairman of House committee investigating Benghazi attacks, says he will not call Hillary Clinton for testimony until State Dept complies with request to turn over documents related to episode; statement makes it unlikely that Clinton will testify before summer.
lead_paragraph: Representative Trey Gowdy, who heads the House committee investigating the Benghazi attack, said the State Department had not met requests for emails.

headline.main: Benghazi Panel Wants Documents Before Hillary Clinton Testifies
headline.print_headline: Panel Seeks State Dept. Documents on Benghazi

snippet: Representative Trey Gowdy, who heads the House committee investigating the Benghazi attack, said the State Department had not met requests for emails.
